name: 9/11 attacks
headline: September 11, 2001 — A sudden geopolitical shock driven by fear and uncertainty rather than economic fundamentals.

name: Hurricane Katrina
headline: August 29, 2005 — A natural disaster revealing regional fragility, infrastructure failure, and energy dependence.

name: iPhone launch
headline: January 9, 2007 — A technological breakthrough representing a positive yet deeply disruptive innovation shock.

name: 2008 financial crisis
headline: September 15, 2008 — A systemic financial collapse originating from within the market itself.

name: Trump elected
headline: November 8, 2016 — A political rupture shaped by expectations, narratives, and collective anticipation.

name: COVID emergency
headline: March 13, 2020 — A global health crisis that rapidly evolved into a human, economic, and systemic shock.
